author: CT Phipps
description:
RoboCop: Unfinished Business is a standalone expansion for RoboCop: Rogue City. I was a huge fan of Rogue City and thought it was a fantastic game that fully managed to capture the appeal of one of my favorite sci-fi franchises. RoboCop is a classic of the cyberpunk genre and envisioned a crime-ridden version of Detroit […]

The post REVIEW: RoboCop: Unfinished Business appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: RoboCop: Unfinished Business
